Package org.lafayette.server.filter

Everything needed for resource request/response filtering.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SecuirityContextFilter Interface for security context filter.
 

Class Summary
AuthenticationResourceFilters Filters the request/response for authentication.
SecurityContextFilterAnonymous Always inject User.ANONYMOUS into the requests security context.
SecurityContextFilterDigest Filters resource request/response for digest authentication.
SecurityContextImpl Implementation of security context.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Authentication  
 

Package org.lafayette.server.filter Description

Everything needed for resource request/response filtering.
